project.name: J-C191A-JENA-07-ST02-DT02-DF06-CF20-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source, and creates a string array based on the value. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32749 or greater, the resultant value underflows and becomes positive. This results in an infinite loop.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND GOOD-05 GOOD-06 AND GOOD-07 AND GOOD-08 AND GOOD-09 AND GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-06-01 AND GOOD-06-02 AND GOOD-06-03 AND GOOD-06-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-07 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-08 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-09-01 AND GOOD-09-02 AND GOOD-09-03 AND GOOD-09-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^some_value\[20\] : 20$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_IMxBkLnUzDpDphySLu6V AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_zKTAI5eFir OR (NOT finished_ZI3vq240YE AND NOT (controlled_exit_46MR4xDy0C OR continued_execution_id8ilS3r0o)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_zKTAI5eFir OR (NOT finished_ZI3vq240YE AND NOT (controlled_exit_46MR4xDy0C OR continued_execution_id8ilS3r0o))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_zKTAI5eFir OR (NOT finished_ZI3vq240YE AND NOT (controlled_exit_46MR4xDy0C OR continued_execution_id8ilS3r0o)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_zKTAI5eFir OR (NOT finished_ZI3vq240YE AND NOT (controlled_exit_46MR4xDy0C OR continued_execution_id8ilS3r0o)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^some_value\[20\] : 20$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_xvVUZEtZewHq5hxKaidu AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_1PNZJ39sTp OR (NOT finished_2K5gMwA6A7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_d81dQqrAlA OR continued_execution_tX0dxsvOBw)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_1PNZJ39sTp OR (NOT finished_2K5gMwA6A7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_d81dQqrAlA OR continued_execution_tX0dxsvOBw))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_1PNZJ39sTp OR (NOT finished_2K5gMwA6A7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_d81dQqrAlA OR continued_execution_tX0dxsvOBw)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_1PNZJ39sTp OR (NOT finished_2K5gMwA6A7 AND NOT (controlled_exit_d81dQqrAlA OR continued_execution_tX0dxsvOBw)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
